recipes.title: Simple Crepes
recipes.description: Classic thin crepes perfect for sweet or savory fillings.
steps: Whisk flour, eggs, milk, butter, and salt until smooth.
Heat a nonstick pan; pour a thin layer of batter; swirl to coat.
Cook until edges lift, flip, and cook 20–30s. Repeat.
Fill with fruit, jam, or savory fillings and serve.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipes.description: A quick Italian pasta with garlic, olive oil, and chili flakes.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Sauté sliced garlic in olive oil until fragrant; add chili flakes.
Toss pasta with oil, garlic, and chopped parsley. Season and serve.

recipes.title: Veggie Omelette
recipes.description: Fluffy omelette with mixed vegetables and cheese.
steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Sauté onion and pepper; add spinach to wilt.
Pour eggs; cook softly; add cheese; fold and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Colorful chicken and vegetables in a savory sauce.
steps: Stir-fry chicken until browned; remove.
Stir-fry vegetables until crisp-tender.
Return chicken; add soy sauce, garlic, ginger; toss and serve.

recipes.title: Tomato Soup
recipes.description: Comforting tomato soup, perfect with grilled cheese.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add tomatoes and broth; simmer 15 minutes.
Blend until smooth; add cream; season and serve.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter bread; place cheese between slices.
Grill on a skillet until golden on both sides.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes for a hearty breakfast.
steps: Whisk dry ingredients; add milk, egg, butter; mix.
Cook scoops on a griddle until bubbles; flip; serve.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Crispy edges, chewy centers, loaded with chocolate.
steps: Cream butter and sugars; beat in egg.
Stir in dry ingredients and chocolate chips.
Scoop and bake at 175°C/350°F for ~10–12 minutes.
